tool_description: Real time financial news and sentiments of stocks and currencies, powered by OpenAI.
name: Real Time Financial News and Sentiments
title: Real Time Financial News and Sentiments
tool_name: Real Time Financial News and Sentiments

api_list.name: /news/rapidapi
api_list.description: Retrieve news either for all stocks and currencies or by a specific ticker symbol.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Number of news items to return per page.

optional_parameters.name: ticker
optional_parameters.description: Ticker symbol for the stock or currency. Use prefix \\\"C:\\\" for currency. For example `AAPL` for `Apple Inc.` and `C:EUR` for `Euro`. If it empty, return all news of stocks and currencies.
